name: Emmy's Wedding
author: Emmy Wilkinson & Matthew Stuart Dunn
kind: 40-bar reel for four couples in a four-couple longwise set

contents.content:
»Luckenbooth Brooch«: 1st and 4th couples cast in four bars. 2nd
couple step up and 3rd couple step down on bars 3-4. 1st and 4th
couples dance a half figure of eight around 2nd and 3rd couples.

»Wedding Rings«: 1st and 4th couples in second and third places dance
set and rotate.
1st couple turn both hands one and a half times in four bars.

4th couple cross down below 1st couple while 3rd couple cast up to
second place.

»Love in Paris«: 1st couple dance figure of love around the 3rd and
4th couples and return to own sides, finishing facing out.

»Celebration at Fingask«: 1st, 3rd and 4th couples dance a promenade
chain progression, finishing in order 2, 4, 1, 3.
